alert.note: Alert for Cherry; Grant; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 5:48PM CDT until June 20 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CHERRY...NORTHWESTERN GRANT AND SOUTHEASTERN SHERIDAN COUNTIES... At 447 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of Ellsworth, or 37 miles east of Alliance, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ellsworth, Watson Lake, Bingham, Dipping Vat Meadow, Wolf Hill, Finnegan Lake, Kennedy Lake and Mother Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 118 and 132. Highway 61 between mile markers 166 and 180. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
